summary:
So recently I read the fic about Sansa in different Westeroi houses by darks1st3r (check it out in Ao3)  
Anyway.... Like...
body:
Hear me out

So recently I read the fic about Sansa in different Westeroi houses by darks1st3r (check it out in Ao3)

Anyway…. Like there’s a chapter with Sansa as a Lannister and she marries Rhaegor targareon

So… I started thinking and I thought how cool would it be if instead getting killed by mad king like elia, she becomes a complete badass and now embraces her inner Lannister (and her stark goodness) and somehow saves brandon and Rickard stark, takes out the mad king, puts out the rebellion.

But……

It doesn’t end there… So Rhaegor Targareon reigns and lyanna becomes his beloved second wife… But like literally everyone knows that the kingdom is run by SANSA THE QUEEN (we all know Rhaegor is a harp playing fboy and honestly could not efficiently rule like Sansa) …. So young Sansa had agreed to Rhaegor originally using lyanna as broodmare to fulfill the prophecy by believing his (foolish) words…. Now though she sees that it was bulls**t…

In these past years she and ser Arthur dayne have grown close (kinda like queen and Joe in the princess Diaries, nothing dishonorable also I kinda love this crack ship lowkey)

So one day ie 15 years later cercei is humiliating Sansa and Sansa has a light bulb moment and she’s like I will take an annulment and all cos why not…? The kingdom is stable and she can cos she has good relations with everyone (seriously people love her and all the houses fear her) and she is Lannister so she can make money either way not a problem for her. (I kinda want Sansa to be selfish… God knows she deserves it)

So she does divorce Rhaegor but her children are still heirs(and they are amazing cos raised by her so no idiots like Joffrey) and Ser Arthur Dayne is released from his oath to kingsgaurd… And they travel to lys or whatever (kinda like Greece)

But then word reaches that the others have arrived and Rhaegor has no actual plans cos the westeros has gone to shambles now that she is away… So they return and goddammit she wants the others to get extinct for having to leave lys and for the prophecies that led to Rhaegor and lyanna (she’s still kinda bitter very little bit though) .

So she gathers the kindom and sends her children and Jon to North while she, her knight and oberyn Martell the red viper (iconic trio let’s face it) go to isle of faces and learn how to defeat the night king and all the others and cue to them literally saving the day in the end.

So in the end I kinda picture 4 kingdoms, Starks in North, Arryns in East (Elia Martell marries the nephew of Jon arryn another fanfic that I loved), targareons in the South (they kinda had too) and Lannister in the west ( Tyrion and tywin hates it ha!) .

Last scene I picture is Sansa, Arthur, Oberyn, Elia and her husband being this iconic gang who are gathered like iconic guests in lys in a beautiful kinda Greek house and Oberyn the sass queen is singing the new song about them and Sansa and all is well!!!

PS: had to get this one out of head cos I was that much excited.

THE ICONIC TRIO

Elia Martell ( Deserves every everything good in life)

Also Arthur Dayne.

summary: Sansa,Bran and Lyanna Stark for the ask thing :)
question: Sansa,Bran and Lyanna Stark for the ask thing :)
answer:
Sansa:

general opinion: fall in a hole and die | don’t like them | eh | they’re fine I guess | like them! | love them | actual love of my life
hotness level: get away from me | meh | neutral (a child) | theoretically hot but not my type | pretty hot | gorgeous! | 10/10 would bang
hogwarts house: gryffindor | slytherin | ravenclaw | hufflepuff
best quality: Smart. Adapts quickly. Brave despite her fears. Has a lot of knowledge about different subjects. Diplomatic. 
worst quality: Understandably trusting. Can be snooty. 
ship them with: No one
brotp them with: Jeyne. Miranda. Mya. Margaery.
needs to stay away from: Men
misc. thoughts: A genuinely good person with bad luck. I think she has one of the most interesting stories out of all the main characters. I wish GRRM gave her more chapters in AFFC so we can see more Sansa in the Vale as she’s quite different from Sansa in King’s Landing.

Bran:

general opinion: fall in a hole and die | don’t like them | eh | they’re fine I guess | like them! | love them | actual love of my life
hotness level: get away from me | meh | neutral (another young’un) | theoretically hot but not my type | pretty hot | gorgeous! | 10/10 would bang
hogwarts house: gryffindor | slytherin | ravenclaw | hufflepuff
best quality: Brave. Kind. Tries to deal with his disability as best as he can. Has shown to have a good head for ruling. Curiosity. A sweet child.
worst quality: His treatment of Hodor
ship them with: No one
brotp them with: Jojen. Meera. Rickon. Osha
needs to stay away from: Jaime. The Others
misc. thoughts: He will be the knight he always dreamed of, only instead of a sword he’ll use powerful magic to save humanity and then help it rebuild.

Lyanna:

general opinion: fall in a hole and die | don’t like them | eh | they’re fine I guess | like them! | love them | actual love of my life
hotness level: get away from me | meh | neutral | theoretically hot but not my type | pretty hot | gorgeous! | 10/10 would bang
hogwarts house: gryffindor | slytherin | ravenclaw | hufflepuff
best quality: Stood up for Howland Reed
worst quality: Ran away with a married man I guess
ship them with: No one
brotp them with: Benjen. Howland.
needs to stay away from: Rhaegar
misc. thoughts: It’s kind of interesting how protective people are of her in the fandom. I have seen dozens of posts about how irresponsible and stupid Sansa and Robb are but Lyanna has absolutely 0 culpability in anything ever.

summary:
Why do so many anti Sansas say Sansa hated Jon or ignored him?
There is no evidence for that.
Yes, they interacted little, but...
body:
Why do so many anti Sansas say Sansa hated Jon or ignored him?

There is no evidence for that.

Yes, they interacted little, but that is not strange. They had nothing in common. Sansa was trained to be a lady, Jon a solider. Jon has mostly masculine interests, Sansa femenine.

If Sansa had interests in stick fighting like Arya she would have interacted with her brothers more, including Jon, but she doesn’t have interests in that.

If Jon was more like Sam and enjoyed reading, singing or perheaps even dancing he would have interacted with Sansa more. But he isn’t interested in that.

How would their paths cross? What would they have to talk about?

Yes, she called him half brother, but suprise, suprise he is her half brother!

They both have positive memories of eachother and care for eachother. There is no evidence they hated eachother or ignored eachother, the contrary.

Yes, little interaction, but in a big family not everyone is as close, especially when you have little in common.

And also yes, there was strain on their relationship because of Catelyn, but we see no hate or dislike from any side.

tags: a song of ice and fire
summary: I have bad news and I’m sorry
title: I have bad news and I’m sorry
body:
I don’t think Arya and Gendry are going to live happily ever after. Arya’s “not domesticated” and she’s not going to be. Also this:

“Nice, though. A nice oak tree.” He stepped closer, and sniffed at her. “You even smell nice for a change.” “You don’t. You stink.” Arya shoved him back against the anvil and made to run, but Gendry caught her arm. She stuck a foot between his legs and tripped him, but he yanked her down with him, and they rolled across the floor of the smithy. He was very strong, but she was quicker. Every time he tried to hold her still she wriggled free and punched him. Gendry only laughed at the blows, which made her mad. He finally caught both her wrists in one hand and started to tickle her with the other, so Arya slammed her knee between his legs, and wrenched free. Both of them were covered in dirt, and one sleeve was torn on her stupid acorn dress. “I bet I don’t look so nice now,” she shouted. (A Storm of Swords - Arya IV)

and this

“I have been spared that, Seven save me, but I have heard them in the night, and more than once. So many voices…a sound to curdle a man’s blood. It even set Dog to shivering, and Dog has killed a dozen wolves.” He ruffled the dog’s head. “Some will tell you that they are demons. They say the pack is led by a monstrous she-wolf, a stalking shadow grim and grey and huge. They will tell you that she has been known to bring aurochs down all by herself, that no trap nor snare can hold her, that she fears neither steel nor fire, slays any wolf that tries to mount her, and devours no other flesh but man.” (A Feast for Crows - Brienne V)

Arya is wild. Arya is free. Marriage and a settled life are not a proper match for this girl. She’s been telling us since season one. Please listen to her.

summary: This scene harkens back to season one. We last saw Nymeria when Arya made her run away because she wanted to save Nymeria’s...
text: This scene harkens back to season one. We last saw Nymeria when Arya made her run away because she wanted to save Nymeria’s life, when Cersei was gonna kill her if she found her. When she finally finds Nymeria again, or Nymeria finds her, and she of course wants her to come back home with her and be her loyal companion again, but Nymeria’s found her own life. ‘That’s not you’ is a direct reference to what Arya herself said to her father when her father painted this picture for her of this life she could have as a lady of a castle and marrying some lord and wearing a nice frilly dress. Arya’s not domesticated and it makes total sense that her wolf wouldn’t be either and once the wolf walks away, at first she’s heartbroken to have come this close but then she realizes the wolf is doing exactly what she would do if she were that wolf.
source: D.B. Weiss, Game of Thrones, Inside the Episode, 7x02 “Stormborn”

question: sansa stark :')
answer:
@lizziesaltzmen  Thank you! ^__^

general opinion: fall in a hole and die | don’t like them | eh | they’re fine I guess | like them! | love them | actual love of my life 

hotness level: get away from me | meh | neutral | theoretically hot but not my type | pretty hot | gorgeous! | 10/10 would bang

hogwarts house: gryffindor | slytherin | ravenclaw | hufflepuff (I had to think on this one lol because i think she could easily be a ravenclaw too, but ultimately i think book!sansa values courage over other qualities).

best quality:intuitive, kind, high empath, intelligent, learns and adapts without losing herself. 

worst quality: I guess the way she romanticizes her abusers and certain situations to avoid confronting the truth(it is an understandable coping mechanism but that’s the quality that i personally find the most frustrating as a reader), and also her classism in AGOT. 

Ship them with: So far i’m not actively invested in any Sansa ships, but any ship that involves characters that are nice people and more or less her age is an a-ok ship :).

brotp them with: Book!ARYA, JEYNE, Jon, Bran, Show!Theon, Show!Margaery, Mya, Myranda, etc. Sansa x 10000 brotps is the dream :’). 

needs to stay away from: Sandor, Tyrion and Petyr. 

misc. thoughts: I wish the show had adapted more of her romanticism, kindness, love for songs and such :). Her softness is very important to me :’). And sometimes it feels like the showrunners never really understood her or what makes her strong

misc. thoughts: I wish the show had adapted more of her romanticism, kindness, love for songs and such :). Her softness is very important to me :’). And sometimes it feels like the showrunners never really understood her or what makes her strong

blog.name: cleverjonquil
blog.title: As strong as my lady mother
blog.description: Side blog for all my Sansa/Catelyn/Elia love. Critical of show!Dany but still like book!Dany. Tully Loyalist. Pro Northern Independence. Book Jon >>> Show Jon. I track #courtesyismyarmor and #daughterofrivers

summary: the ask prompt- sansa, jon, bran, elia, aegon vi
question: the ask prompt- sansa, jon, bran, elia, aegon vi
answer:
Sansa:

general opinion: fall in a hole and die | don’t like them | eh | they’re fine I guess | like them! | love them | actual love of my life 

hotness level: get away from me | meh | neutral | theoretically hot but not my type (she’s a little girl and I’m straight but obviously she’s pretty) | pretty hot | gorgeous! | 10/10 would bang

hogwarts house: gryffindor | slytherin | ravenclaw | hufflepuff

best quality: Compassion, empathy, endurance, learns quickly, mercy over violent vengeance

worst quality: Was believably naive and snobbish in book 1. Mostly, her low self esteem.

ship them with: Jon of course, after years of not finding a single Sansa ship I liked that I felt 100% comfortable with (I really, really tried to ship Sansan but the fandom’s obsession with the “"erotic”“ Blackwater scene turned me off for good). Sansa is so sweet and charming she works well with several boys though- Quentyn, Edric, Harry, etc.

brotp them with: Bran (❤️),Myrcella, Missandei, Gilly, Mya, Tommen, Jeyne.

needs to stay away from: Anyone the fandom says "taught her a lesson” *vomit* or “shattered her stupid dreams” ie Petyr, Sandor, Tyrion, and Joffrey. (Ramsay better stay away from her in the books too.)

misc. thoughts: The reason I watched the show and read the books. Really, I loved her even before I started either series just by reading about her! Best character in the series, a valuable and badly needed character in the fantasy genre as a whole, and I’m pleased as pie how the fandom is growing less tolerant of Sansa hate ❤️❤️❤️ Deserves a happy ending. Did nothing wrong. Needs more (true) female friends, though, and for GRRM to stop punishing her for dumb reasons.

Jon:

general opinion: fall in a hole and die | don’t like them | eh | they’re fine I guess | like them! | love them | actual love of my life 

hotness level: get away from me | meh | neutral | theoretically hot but not my type | pretty hot (show!Jon at least. Book!Jon is even younger than my brother) | gorgeous! | 10/10 would bang

hogwarts house: gryffindor | slytherin | ravenclaw | hufflepuff

best quality: good fighter, loyal, able to harden his heart to get stuff done, doesn’t hold a grudge against Catelyn like fans want ;)

worst quality: Snobby, was mean to Gilly, forgets he’s not supposed to get into politics as a NWman.

ship them with: The one and only Jonquil to his Florian the Fool. I toyed with shipping Jon x Val but she’s just too perfect.

brotp them with: Sam, Stannis, Davos, Tormund, Mel (if he could trust her)

needs to stay away from: Mad queens. The pointy end of sharp objects.

misc. thoughts: I wish so much GRRM would be a little more original with his arc and role. Being the noble savior (whose birth apparently was worth a continent being torn apart) is overused. Let Jon be dark!! Gah, I would love Good Queen Sansa the Gentle with her dark, villainous King who would do anything for her. Also, while I appreciate that Jon’s allowed to be wrong sometimes (he’s called out for bullying and is quite mean to poor Gilly), the fandom and d&d are terrible about deifying him. He’s never allowed to not be in the right with them. They victimize him almost as much as they do another certain Stark kid. I like Jon but GRRM should either let him go darker or give him a more unique arc no one saw coming.

Bran:

general opinion: fall in a hole and die | don’t like them | eh | they’re fine I guess | like them! | love them | actual love of my life 

hotness level: get away from me | meh | neutral (adorable child) | theoretically hot but not my type | pretty hot | gorgeous! | 10/10 would bang

hogwarts house: gryffindor | slytherin | ravenclaw | hufflepuff

best quality: Compassion, intelligence, highly observant, doesn’t take crap from the Freys.

worst quality: Stubborn, may give into his anger snd turn dark. Thinks girls are icky.

ship them with: Nobody overall, but I kind of wished GRRM had given us a little Bran x Myrcella (even though I love Trystane x Myrcella). Bran x Shireen is cute too.

brotp them with: Sansa, Rickon, Hodor, the Reeds.

needs to stay away from: Lannisters and creepy tree wizards who have Seven know what planned for you.

misc. thoughts: Very precious, cute little boy who tried his best to be a ruler at a tender age and did a remarkably good job. The harvest feast scene is a favorite of mine and says a lot about Bran’s generosity and thoughtfulness despite what a small scene it was. It isn’t hard to see why he’s Cat’s special boy and Sansa’s favorite brother. I really hope he lives AND keeps his good heart at the end, unlike the show. He reminds me a little of my own brother who I’m close to just like Sansa- intelligent, easygoing, makes friends easily. Let him save the North instead of those lizards.

Elia:

general opinion: fall in a hole and die | don’t like them | eh | they’re fine I guess | like them! | love them | actual love of my life 

hotness level: get away from me | meh | neutral | theoretically hot but not my type | pretty hot | gorgeous! | 10/10 would bang

ship them with: Her husband that she married. That is, at least, in some au where he treated her with the respect she deserved. I truly do like them otherwise; they look good together and she would have made him a good queen if he’d had the sense to love her.

brotp them with: Oberyn, Ellaria, Rhaella. Sansa and Cat, so hard. If y'all ever write or read a fanfic of her meeting them, let me know. I think they’d all like each other.

needs to stay away from: Disrespectful husbands. Cersei, maybe. That unnecessary body shaming comment makes her sound like she’d have been Elia’s high school bully, lol

misc. thoughts: My favorite of the Martells in spite of GRRM still not letting us know more about her. She sounds very elegant and sharp, feminine and regal. Maybe the sweet demeanor was an act, but I like to think at least some of it was true for even Rhaegar to be genuinely fond of her. (Oberyn and his daughters don’t represent all the Martells.) I always liked her but recently I’ve gotten way more into her, especially since GoT trying to paint R/L as a twu wuv story made me stan Elia even more to spite them. Overall it’s pretty impressive how dang salty so many people are over a dead woman who wasn’t all accounts innocent of any wrongdoings and charming person.

Aegon/Young Griff I sadly can’t comment on much. My first read of adwd, I got really bored from the lack of Sansa chapters and Dany’s Meereen arc so I didn’t make it to when we meet him. I’m currently reading it though, and got to when tyrion meets him. Frankly I’d rather he take over Westeros if it must be a Targ (even a fake one). Don’t really see why some dislike him; there’s way ruder characters.
